consultant_supervisor_order LEFT JOIN consultant_supervisor_order_details ON consultant_supervisor_order.order_no=consultant_supervisor_order_details.supervisor_order_no LEFT JOIN mall_trade_order ON consultant_supervisor_order_details.mall_trad_order_no=mall_trade_order.order_no LEFT JOIN user ON user.id=consultant_supervisor_order.supervisor_id
